name: Jan van Gemert
content: Jan van Gemert Zoeken Sluit zoek Jan van Gemert Jan van Gemert received a PhD degree from the University of Amsterdam in 2010. There he was a post-doctoral fellow as well as at École Normale Supérieure in Paris. Currently he leads the Computer Vision lab at Delft University of Technology. He teaches the Deep learning and Computer Vision MSc courses. His research focuses on visual inductive priors for deep learning for automatic image and video understanding. He published over 75 peer-reviewed papers with more than 5,000 citations.Publication on Google scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=JUdMRGcAAAAJ Deel deze pagina: Facebook Linkedin Twitter Email WhatsApp Deel deze pagina Jan van Gemert +31 15 27 88434 J.C.vanGemert@tudelft.nl Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Mathematics and Computer Science Intelligent Systems Van Mourik Broekmanweg 6 2628 XE Delft The Netherlands Room 6E.340 Homepage
